dcterms:creator: C. Zhang
M. Raghu
J. M. Kleinberg
S. Bengio
dcterms:description: MNIST Pointer-Value Retrieval (MNIST-PVR) is a visual reasoning task constructed using the MNIST dataset, where an input consists of four MNIST images arranged in a grid, and the top left image acts as a pointer to select one of the other images.
dcterms:title: MNIST-PVR

dcterms:creator: Z. Wu
E. Kreiss
D. C. Ong
C. Potts
dcterms:description: ReaSCAN is a synthetic command-based navigation task that builds off the SCAN and gSCAN benchmarks, where the goal is to predict an action sequence for an agent to reach a referred target based on a command and a grid world.
dcterms:title: ReaSCAN

dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
K. Richardson
C. Potts
dcterms:description: MQNLI is a synthetic natural language inference dataset where the task is to label the semantic relation between two sentences as entailment, contradiction, or neutral.
dcterms:title: MQNLI
